prompt: 매일 머무는 공간을 예술로. 감각적인 디자인과 편안함을 동시에 잡은 신상 가구, 직접 체험해 보세요.
svg:
<svg width="1920" height="1080" viewBox="0 0 1920 1080" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background Gradient and Shapes -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="background_gradient" x1="0" y1="0" x2="1" y2="1">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FDFDFF"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#E5E8ED"/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>

  <rect id="bg_rect" x="0" y="0" width="1920" height="1080" fill="url(#background_gradient)"/>

  <path id="abstract_shape_1"
    d="M 1920 0 L 1500 0 C 1400 200 1600 400 1300 500 L 1920 600 Z"
    fill="#D0D5DD" opacity="0.6"/>
  <path id="abstract_shape_2"
    d="M 0 1080 L 400 1080 C 500 880 300 680 600 580 L 0 480 Z"
    fill="#D0D5DD" opacity="0.6"/>

  <!-- Stylized Furniture Piece (e.g., a modern armchair) -->
  <g id="furniture_group" transform="translate(650 350)">
    <path id="chair_seat" d="M 150 150 H 450 C 470 150 480 160 480 180 V 350 C 480 370 470 380 450 380 H 150 C 130 380 120 370 120 350 V 180 C 120 160 130 150 150 150 Z" fill="#8B4513" stroke="#A0522D" stroke-width="5"/>
    <path id="chair_back" d="M 180 100 H 420 C 440 100 450 110 450 130 V 250 C 450 270 440 280 420 280 H 180 C 160 280 150 270 150 250 V 130 C 150 110 160 100 180 100 Z" fill="#A0522D" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="5"/>
    <rect id="chair_leg_fl" x="180" y="380" width="20" height="80" fill="#654321"/>
    <rect id="chair_leg_fr" x="400" y="380" width="20" height="80" fill="#654321"/>
    <rect id="chair_leg_bl" x="150" y="380" width="20" height="80" fill="#654321" transform="rotate(5 150 380)"/>
    <rect id="chair_leg_br" x="430" y="380" width="20" height="80" fill="#654321" transform="rotate(-5 430 380)"/>
    <ellipse id="accent_pillow" cx="280" cy="200" rx="60" ry="40" fill="#D4A17B" transform="rotate(10 280 200)"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Text Elements -->
  <text id="headline_1" x="100" y="180" font-family="Pretendard, sans-serif" font-size="72" font-weight="bold" fill="#333333">
    매일 머무는 공간을
  </text>
  <text id="headline_2" x="100" y="260" font-family="Pretendard, sans-serif" font-size="72" font-weight="bold" fill="#333333">
    예술로
  </text>

  <text id="sub_headline_1" x="100" y="380" font-family="Pretendard, sans-serif" font-size="48" fill="#555555">
    감각적 디자인과
  </text>
  <text id="sub_headline_2" x="100" y="440" font-family="Pretendard, sans-serif" font-size="48" fill="#555555">
    편안함 동시에
  </text>

  <text id="cta_line_1" x="100" y="700" font-family="Pretendard, sans-serif" font-size="60" font-weight="bold" fill="#8B4513">
    신상 가구 체험
  </text>
  <text id="cta_line_2" x="100" y="770" font-family="Pretendard, sans-serif" font-size="60" font-weight="bold" fill="#8B4513">
    직접 경험하세요
  </text>

  <!-- Decorative Swirl -->
  <path id="decorative_swirl"
    d="M 1700 80 C 1800 150 1750 250 1600 300 C 1450 350 1350 300 1300 200 C 1250 100 1300 0 1450 50 Z"
    fill="none" stroke="#D4A17B" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>

</svg>
